More than 30 years in business World-class customer service Fast, FREE shipping Free 2-year warranty on nearly every product Free tech support from audio experts Solidbody Electric Guitar with Mahogany Body, Mahogany Neck, Maple Top, Rosewood Fingerboard, 2 Humbucking Pickups, and Vibrato - Charcoal BurstThe PRS Mark Tremonti Signature solidbody electric guitar gives you a gorgeous, vintage-inspired Singlecut with a striking maple top. Typical of Paul Reed Smith, the fit and finish on this axe are impeccable. You get a fast Pattern Thin neck that plays like butter. Two Tremonti humbuckers, which were designed to compliment Mark's agressive playing, deliver a huge arsenal of tone, while a PRS whammy serves up the vibe with incredible smoothness, stability, and sustain. If you're a reformed axe slinger with a taste for the finer things, you'll totally appreciate the splendid PRS Mark Tremonti Signature. PRS Mark Tremonti Signature Solidbody Electric Guitar at a Glance: The signature axe of a rock legend Mouth-watering visuals and outstanding playability Topped off with a stunning PRS V12 finish The signature axe of a rock legend Mark Tremonti is one of those musically diverse guitarists who makes the rounds in and out of the world of hard rock. His repertoire varies from driving guitar work with Creed and Alter Bridge to a highly technical solo career work with everyone from Sevendust to Larry the Cable Guy. Equally well geared for shredding, riffing, and even the occasional clean passage, this highly versatile axe gives you a massive range of playing options. If you want performance, tone, and style fit for a pro, then pick up your Mark Tremonti Signature from Sweetwater today! Mouth-watering visuals and outstanding playability On the PRS Mark Tremonti Signature, thoughtful touches abound, such as the perfectly formed belly cut that lets the '58 fit you like a glove. From tonewoods to electronics, there's artistry and genius in the details of this gorgeously crafted guitar. But you'd expect nothing less from Paul Reed Smith: a master luthier known for guitars you just can't put down. PRS enjoys a well-deserved reputation for marrying sonic mojo with mouth-watering visuals and outstanding playability. As usual, they've done a terrific job with the Mark Tremonti Signature. Go ahead, pick it up and start playing. Just make sure you don't have anything to do for the next day or so. Topped off with a stunning PRS V12 finish The PRS Mark Tremonti Signature is finished in a stunning PRS V12 finish. If you're seeking a vintage vibe with a sophisticated edge, your search ends here. Over a decade in the making, PRS's V12 finish blends the thin, resonance-enhancing characteristics of a nitro finish with the non-cracking reliability you expect from a modern acrylic finish. It has a classic feel all its own, making your guitar feel like an old instrument; one that will stay flawless-looking for years to come. PRS Mark Tremonti Signature Solidbody Electric Guitar Features: Mahogany singlecut body with belly cut and gorgeous figured maple top Fast Pattern Thin neck with rosewood fingerboard 2 Tremonti humbuckers designed to compliment agressive playing PRS vibrato bridge provides exceptional sustain and tuning stability Handcrafted in the USA Hardshell case included Rock seriously, with the PRS Mark Tremonti Signature!
